data.text: @Variety Zero chance she didn’t know he was a player. https://t.co/YJr9XNN7yZ

@amar71168 @Variety @HardballChris @NBCPolitics @NBCNews Nope. I said nothing about Ms. @Oprah Winfrey who was literally growing her multi-billion dollar empire in Chicago, mentoring students in her South Africa all girls academics STEM school. https://t.co/QgAR2wdPTN
@Variety Wow Katie Couric is the Joker!!!!!!!

@Variety A guy who repeatedly pinched his colleague's a#s is usually a good indicator. Moving along.  @HardballChris  career littered w misogynistic 🐷 comments @NBCPolitics  @NBCNews  #TimesUp https://t.co/v9NU25pLbT
@Variety Wow, now there’s some intriguing comments, NOT. Go away Couric!
@Variety She had to have known, generally speaking, what he was up to. It doesn't make her culpable, but it does make her a liar.

@Variety #Couric called me for an interview while she worked @TODAYshow (1996?). I had filed 23 sexual harassment failure to hire claims @USEEOC.  I needed an attorney-NOT a #talkshow host! Also heard from reliable source Couric investigated & dumped GOOD news stories while @CBSNews! Mmm
@Variety @katiecouric  worked w/ Matt Lauer for 15 and noticed nothing. "That's not the Matt I know" 😏
